Creating a Sample in R

```{r}
# Creating a population of students and ages 
# Storing it in a data frame
Names=c("Bob","Mary","Wlliam","George","Lucas", "Mathew","Angel","Steven","Ariana","Chen")
length(Names)

Ages=c(22,23,21,25,28,25,23,23,32,28) 
length(Ages)

Pop=data.frame(Names=Names,Ages=Ages)

Pop
```

Add a new chunk by clicking the *Insert Chunk* button on the toolbar or by pressing *Cmd+Option+I*.
```{r}
# Checking results
head(Pop)

```
```{r}
# Sampling: drawing a sample of 4 students out 
# of the 10 without replacement 

S=sample(1:10,size=4,replace=FALSE) 
S
```

```{r}
# Creating a final final containing data 
S.data=Pop[S,] 
S.data

```
